Reviews.Title: save your money
Reviews.Author: D. Maxwell "Debbie"
Reviews.Content: camera did not work with our computer. It did not have a display screen which I thought it had  when I read the advertisment.it only takes 16 pictures. not a good buy. The company refunded my money promptly.

Reviews.Title: Don't order even if free
Reviews.Author: Taffy Lewis
Reviews.Content: A waste of $20.  The picture quality is bad, the camera featureless, the storage so small it can only be used as a webcam.  And the worst part is the software that the argus makes you install to get your pictures off--clearly designed by drunk sadists.  Unless you enjoy misery, avoid this camera no matter how cheap.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointing
Reviews.Author: dennis
Reviews.Content: I purchased this because I was hoping to save money from constantly buying disposable cameras. Unfortunately, this camera isn't compatible with my computer, and the entire interface is somewhat confusing.

Reviews.Title: Argus LLC 1088 camera
Reviews.Author: vywhiteknits
Reviews.Content: This camera has no view screen, so its just like having a 35mm camera. It is not a good purchase for a beginner digital photographer and or a child, spend some more money and get a better camera.
